title: Judge Dredd - Grand Hall of Justice versus Democracy
description:
This series covers the full history of the Judge system in Mega-City One - from it's very origins onwards throughout Dredd's career. It explores the struggle for democracy against the Council of Five's belief in the system and the great lengths they will go to maintain their power.

In particular it explores Dredd's participation in the crushing of the democratic movement and his later doubts and misgivings about his past actions and the very system he has sworn to protect.


Included in the files are the acclaimed "America" series, often cited as the best Dredd stories ever written and illustrated.


I have collated this series and offer great thanks to the original up loaders.
